programme.desc: A supermodel (Ben Stiller) befriends a rival (Owen Wilson) while becoming mixed-up in a brainwashing and assassination plot.

programme.desc: A special agent recruits former models Derek Zoolander and Hansel to save the world's most beautiful people from a deadly plot.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: After an ambitious manager (Jamie Foxx) gives them a shot at stardom, three singers learn that fame can carry a high personal cost.

programme.desc: The cyborg policeman (Peter Weller) and his female partner (Nancy Allen) oppose the mayor and a drug magnate in Old Detroit.

programme.title: RoboCop 3
programme.desc: The cyborg policeman (Robert John Burke) takes to the air to defend a run-down neighborhood from a Japanese tycoon.

programme.title: Into the Blue 2: The Reef

programme.title: Godfather of Harlem

programme.desc: Former Special Forces agent John Rambo blasts through Soviet-occupied Afghanistan in search of his captive mentor.
